Sound Recorder by EZ Code needs permission to use your microphone and permission to save files on your device to continue. Please allow these permissions.
Sound Recorder by EZ Code needs permission to save recordings to your device to continue. Please allow this permission.
If enabled, recordings will take up more space on your device, but will sound clearer on playback.
When recording, display a notification with \'pause\' and \'stop\' actions for easy access.
What are the permissions needed for?

Sound Recorder needs access to your storage, media and files in order to be able to store the recordings on your device. The \'record audio\' permissions is required to capture audio from your microphone to record sound. Although Sound Recorder has access to sensitive data on your device, EZ Code will never share this data with other companies or even EZ Code employees.
How do I leave feedback for this application?

From the main window, press the overflow button, which looks like 3 dots stacked vertically, in the top right corner. Then press \'Give feedback\'. Enter your issue and any other additional information and tap \'send\'
Welcome to Recorder, a simple, intuitive and fluid application for recording all the sounds around you.
